titleStmt.title: Skialetheia. Or, A shadowe of truth, in certaine epigrams and satyres
titleStmt.author: Guilpin, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] for Nicholas Ling, and are to bee solde at the little west doore of Poules,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
